omissions.finding_text: family history of heart disease (not mentioned but implied by prior lobectomy)

concerns: BP 120/80 may not accurately reflect long-term control

missed_differentials.reasoning: Patient reports shortness of breath with exertion, chest pounding with exertion, and fever/chills. These symptoms could be indicative of a panic disorder.
Patient has a family history of heart disease (implied by prior lobectomy) and reports chest pounding with exertion. This could be indicative of cardiac disease.

guideline_checks.plan_item: Order echocardiogram to evaluate the murmur.

safety_checks.description: No known allergies to Prozac or Norvasc.
Dosing of Prozac is within normal range, but patient reports adherence issues on weekends.
